description: Soccer Slammers is 2-on-2 arcade football with no rules. Just fast-paced fun for 1 to 4 players on a single Nintendo Switchâ„¢. Crush your opponent by mastering power shots, slam tackles, bank shots, super sprints, and team combo-shots! Warm up with a two minute Quick Game or go for glory in the World Cup against the top 32 teams in the world.
name: Soccer Slammers
intro: Fast-paced 2-on-2 Arcade Football for 1 to 4 Players!
